document.full_text: the company that runs japan's crippled nuclear power plant said that it had plugged a crack in a maintenance pit that had been gushing highly radioactive water into the ocean.
document.title: company says radioactive water leak at japan plant is plugged
lines_and_colors: the company that runs japan's crippled nuclear power plant said that it had plugged a crack in a maintenance pit that had been gushing highly radioactive water into the ocean.
